spring.000: %Kin is busy humming joyfully to himself.
kinrain.000: I am actually quite fond of the rain.$0#$b#It is very peaceful to both look at and hear.$0#$b#Plus, it is very good for my skin~.$1
summer.000: I would love to visit the beach. It would be the perfect time to do so.$0#$b#Alas, I should not leave the comfort and safety of these woods...$2
fall.000: Oh, I just love autumn.$4#$b#It is absolutely the most beautiful time of year, is it not?$1
winter.000: Oh my, it is s-so cold...$2#$b#Ah, who am I kidding.$0#$b#I much prefer the cold compared to the heat.$1
